name: Runehammer
description:
You are stranded on a mysterious island, armed with nothing but your trusty hammer. Brave your way through countless dangers, vanquish evil creatures and discover the story of Runehammer. 

This game is still under development, you may encounter various bugs . You can play the first part of the adventure right now, but there's still more to come. If you like the game and want to enjoy the full adventure as soon as possible, feel free to donate! 

Stay tuned for updates!

Ervin
